products.title: 40TH ANNIVERSARY SONGS PULLOVER HOODIE
products.description: Damn, 40 years is a long time. Get a hoodie! 80% organic cotton / 20% recycled polyester Artwork by Tony Squindo

products.title: SAD BUT TRUE T-SHIRT2
products.description: Featuring "Sad But True" artwork by Pushead  100% Cotton  We've improved our shirts! We know, after 40 years why bother? But we are now bringing you softer, lighter, form-fitting shirts that will feel like a sweet (Last) Caress of baby chick feathers. We're done with the cardboard tee's so please be patient with the updates and know that change can be a good thing. Happy shopping!  NOTE: Size charts are for general reference. The fit may vary depending on construction, materials and manufacturer. Sizing may also vary between and within brands.
